title: Strand
description: One arm, no weapons, and no backup. Just like old times.Mechanical-armed ex-soldier turned spaceship thief, Jacob Strand, is drawn back into a world he thought he’d left behind, when he’s framed for a gruesome multiple murder and hounded by a mysterious military unit. With the help of his best friend, and leader of the local crime syndicate, Terrick, he must face his demons and take the fight to those who seek to destroy Violence, one (very) mild torture scene, nothing explicit or gratuitous.
author: Adam Slade
